title: Deploy Flask App to Heroku
content: This article explains how to deploy a Flask app using Gunicorn and Heroku CLI.

title: Fix Docker Permission Denied Errors
content: If you get 'permission denied' running Docker, try adding your user to the docker group: sudo usermod -aG docker $USER. Log out and back in after this change.

title: Understanding Git Merge vs Rebase
content: Git merge combines histories and retains commits. Rebase re-applies commits to a new base. Use rebase for linear history, and merge to preserve branch context.

title: Set Up Jenkins for Python CI/CD
content: Install Jenkins and configure a pipeline that runs pytest and flake8. Use virtualenv and caching for dependencies. Archive test results for reporting.

title: Deploy Streamlit App on AWS EC2
content: Install Streamlit, configure a security group for port 8501, and run the app with `streamlit run app.py`. Use Nginx to reverse proxy if needed.
